member.name: MF_OPM_CGMSA_PROTECTION_LEVEL.MF_OPM_CGMSA_COPY_FREELY
member.summary: The protection level is Copy Freely.

member.summary: The protection level is Copy No More.

member.summary: The protection level is Copy One Generation.

member.name: MF_OPM_CGMSA_PROTECTION_LEVEL.MF_OPM_CGMSA_REDISTRIBUTION_CONTROL_REQUIRED
member.summary: Redistribution control (also called the broadcast flag) is required. This flag can be combined with the other flags.
